about_the_game:
About This Game

Bail Force is inspired by hit action roguelikes such as Dead Cells and Hades, classic action video game series such as Mega Man X and Sunset Riders, tech wear jackets, and Cyberpunk settings.

Choose between Angel and Lea, two bounty hunters living in the dystopian New Rise City. Where bounty hunters are more trusted than law enforcement, and often are the most effective way of ensuring public safety. Chase criminals through different areas in the city and fight your way through gangsters, cyberpunk ninjas, and drones operated by crime syndicates. There are many people who want bounty hunters dead in this chaotic city, and only you can save your character from dying.

Every chase will be different, and every chase can end your life.

Fight randomly generated enemies in randomly generated areas in the city, with randomly generated power-ups. After all, you never know where your target will run to. Equip Add-Ons, upgrades that enhance your movement and attacks in every way possible, and discover the most effective combination for your playstyle and character. Enemies will get stronger the more you defeat them, so make sure you have what it takes to survive. Attack in melee, use ranged weapons, jump, slide, and dash to evade attacks to survive and overcome any incoming threat towards your character.

Introducing our unique mechanic, Adaptive Combat System.

Daring to take action roguelite design to the next level, Bail Force introduces Adaptive Combat System, where your enemy will adapt from your preferred fighting style and adjust their capabilities accordingly, making combat more challenging and evolve as you play. In the information age, enemies will logically learn and find information about you and your fighting style, so as they adapt, you must face their challenge and beat them all for the sake of your mission.

Experience the depth of Conflict between co-workers.

Angel and Lea fight for different reasons; Angel becomes a bounty hunter for the sake of revenge, while Lea wants the bounty money to live. They have the same quarry: Boarman, the leading crime lord in the city. Someone does not want Angel to become a bounty hunter, and thus, she arranges a conflict between him and Lea. How does the story play out? Find out only by playing Bail Force! Discover different storylines and different endings!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains boss enemy that actually a degenerate who throws underwear (small pixeled projectile) at player.
